name: Slowly
content: Hey 是什么原因
心咚咚跳不停
世界都变得 好安静
Hey 想象过的你
是怎样的表情
让我沉迷
Slowly slowly we fall in love
Slowly slowly I can't leave you
Slowly slowly I am with you
I love you
Slowly slowly we fall in love
Slowly slowly I can't leave you
Slowly slowly I am with you
I love you
Hey 我有个决定
在每个星空里
我都要 靠近你
Hey 我要拥抱你
从未如此确定
我很想你
Slowly slowly we fall in love
Slowly slowly I can't leave you
Slowly slowly I am with you
I love you

Slowly slowly I am with you
I love you

I love you
